alert.note: Alert for Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walworth County through 600 PM CDT... At 526 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Lowry, or 7 miles southeast of Selby, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lowry around 545 PM CDT. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
